summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeGive BackBubble's Going Places On-the-Go Essentials Kit helps you Face the Day, wherever it takes you. Refresh skin, reapply SPF, and hydrate lips, all in one kit.
details: DetailsBenefitsDeveloped with dermatologistsTell All helps soothe and soften dry lipsSolar Mate helps protect skin from harmful UV raysBounce Back helps balance skin and reduce midday shineKey IngredientsZinc Oxide provides your first line of defense against the sun.Raspberry Seed Extract helps provide antioxidant protection against UV rays.Sodium PCA + Niacinamide help improve texture and radiance.Moringa Oil Esters provide exceptional moisturization and skin barrier recovery.IncludesTell All Juicy Secret Berry Lip Balm (0.15 oz)Solar Mate Invisible Daily Mineral Sunscreen (1.7 oz)Bounce Back Balancing Toner Mist (1.8 oz)Mesh Zipper PouchItem 2634733How To UseSpray Bounce Back 3-5 inches from your face for an instant skin reset anytime. Follow by evenly applying a generous amount of Solar Mate (about 2-4 pumps) to your face (before applying makeup and 30 minutes before sun exposure). Reapply every 2-3 hours to maintain protection. Finish by evenly applying Tell All to lips.IngredientsBounce Back: Water (Aqua), Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Citric Acid, Echinacea Angustifolia Root Extract, Echinacea Purpurea Extract, Echinacea Purpurea Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Maris Aqua (Sea Water), Niacinamide, Salix Nigra (Willlow) Bark Extract, Sodium PCA, Sodium Phytate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Citronellol, Geraniol.Solar Mate: Active - Zinc Oxide -- 12%.Inactive: Water (Aqua), Isoamyl Laurate, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Poly C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate, Cetearyl Olivate, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Sorbitan Olivate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Phenoxyethanol, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Butylene Glycol, Rubus Idaeus Seed Oil, Xanthan Gum, Cellulose Gum, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Theobroma Cacao Seed Extract.Tell All Juicy Secret: Olea Europaea (Olive) Husk Oil, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Mango Butter Dimer Dilinoleyl Esters/Dimer Dilinoleate Copolymer, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Hydrogenated Castor Oil Dimer Dilinoleate, Silica, Jojoba Esters, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Hydrogenated Rapeseed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Moringa Oil/Hydrogenated Moringa Oil Esters, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Acacia Decurrens Flower Wax, Cichorium Intybus Root Extract, Glyceryl Caprylate, Rebaudioside A (Stevia Extract), Polyglycerin-3, Glycerin, Water (Aqua), Flavor.
how_to_use: Spray Bounce Back 3-5 inches from your face for an instant skin reset anytime. Follow by evenly applying a generous amount of Solar Mate (about 2-4 pumps) to your face (before applying makeup and 30 minutes before sun exposure). Reapply every 2-3 hours to maintain protection. Finish by evenly applying Tell All to lips.
ingredients: Geraniol.Solar Mate: Active - Zinc Oxide -- 12%.Inactive: Water (Aqua)
Theobroma Cacao Seed Extract.Tell All Juicy Secret: Olea Europaea (Olive) Husk Oil
Mango Butter Dimer Dilinoleyl Esters/Dimer Dilinoleate Copolymer

reviews.headline: usually LOVE bubble!
reviews.comments:
I hate having to leave a negative review because I use and love so many bubble products- but I returned this. 
the SPF has a super white cast. you have to sit there rubbing it in like crazy (and the smell isn't great). the facial spray is SO overly scented. broke out after using the 2 products together one time. loved the lip balm! I've used that product for a while now.

reviews.headline: The Perfect Beach Set
reviews.comments: I used this set at the beach and I LOVED it. I used the refreshing spray just before putting in my SPF. SPF didn't sting and felt nice and light on the skin and helped my face attain a nice light tan. And the chapstick is good to just carry around :)

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Made my face feel super hydrated and cute bag!

reviews.headline: I would purchase this item again
reviews.comments: This item is amazing I love this brand so much!

reviews.headline: This product is amazing
reviews.comments: I would definitely buy this product again

reviews.headline: Sunscreen smells rancid
reviews.comments: Like others are saying  the sunscren smells rancid. The other two products are fine but i returned bc the smell does not go away and did not want to use on my face.

reviews.headline: Obsessed with this kit!
reviews.comments: I love the size of everything! It is a perfect on the go kit with summer right around the corner. Everything was great. I'm new to skincare, so a little confused on what the mist was but it felt nice!

reviews.headline: I love this product !!
reviews.comments: The products feel great on my skin and its perfect for the beach as well with summer coming up! Couldn't recommend this enough. Get your hands on it now!

reviews.headline: The perfect summer essentials kit
reviews.comments: This is great for on the go! All I need for the perfect summer day, and a great gift for friends. I love all of the products and I am a big fan. I was gifted this product but my opinion is my own. #bubblegifted

reviews.headline: The perfect set!
reviews.comments: This is great for on the go! All I need for the perfect summer day, and a great gift for friends. I love all of the products and I am a big fan. I was gifted this product but my opinion is my own. #bubblegifted

reviews.headline: Perfect Set!!
reviews.comments: This is the perfect set for a beginner in their skincare routine, and includes the perfect products for staying hydrated and keeping your skin healthy on the go!! #bubblegifted

reviews.headline: all my favs!!!
reviews.comments: this kit includes all of my favorite products in one!! i use all of these daily so i love having them in a kit with a super cute pouch! the sunscreen leaves no white cast on my skin and the lip balm has the best berry scent! the facial spray is super refreshing especially after the gym!!! #bubblegifted

reviews.headline: Super convenient and useful collection of bubble products!
reviews.comments: I love this kit from Bubble! I was gifted this as a part of the Bubble On Campus Ambassador Program and I am in love with it! It came in a cute carrying case and including all my essentials, the spray, the sunscreen, and the chapstick!

reviews.headline: Soo hydrating
reviews.comments: I love this set! Perfect in the winter months or if you just have dry skin in general. Makes for the perfect gift, for yourself or someone you love!! #bubblegifted

reviews.headline: I love it
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this, it is so easy to keep it in my backpack while i'm on campus #bubblegifted

reviews.headline: I love these products!
reviews.comments: I received this from Bubble #bubblegifted and I absolutely LOVE the products in this! The toner adds a nice hydration to the skin and is perfect for layering with your favorite Bubble moisturizer and the sunscreen it comes with. The lip balm made my lips feel super hydrated as well and lasted all day!

reviews.headline: Loved this gift from Bubble!
reviews.comments: Was gifted this by Bubble to try and it was the perfect travel set! The sizes are perfect and I love the on the go bag it comes in! #bubblegifted

reviews.headline: for dry skin girlies (not me)
reviews.comments: The balancing mist (toner) made my skin get oily fast, the sunscreen is a milky consistency and smells weird, and the lip balm is amazing!! It makes sense that all of these products would be together, but it is not for me. #bubblegifted

reviews.headline: Such a cute kit!!
reviews.comments: I love this kit, it has all the essentials I need and the packaging is perfect.

reviews.headline: LOVE LOVE LOVE
reviews.comments: i love all these products, specifically the face mist!! i heavily recommend!!!

media.headline: I would buy this product again

faceoff_positive.comments: This set is amazing! Bubble set over this set to try and I am so happy to be able to use these products! The lip balm is a staple, smells so good and is so convenient to attach to anything! The sunscreen is so smooth to apply and the mist is the best finishing touch. Lastly, the travel case is such a great extra and fits so many more bubble products!! #bubblegifted
faceoff_positive.headline: Would Buy Again and Again

faceoff_negative.comments:
I hate having to leave a negative review because I use and love so many bubble products- but I returned this. 
the SPF has a super white cast. you have to sit there rubbing it in like crazy (and the smell isn't great). the facial spray is SO overly scented. broke out after using the 2 products together one time. loved the lip balm! I've used that product for a while now.
faceoff_negative.headline: usually LOVE bubble!
